title: Maha Pollution Control Board asks Tata Power to halve particulate matter emissions at plant
description: Mumbai is witnessing very high air pollution despite its inherent advantage of being a coastal city. Experts have blamed the infrastructure and construction building activity and poor enforcement of regulations designed to curb pollution for the situation.
